title: Sans-serif font with unique uppercase "B" and "R"
content:
I've tried identifying this font myself, but the uppercase "B" and "R" are very unique. Any help is GREATLY appreciated!!

Thanks Ryuk!

Font: 

 Archive 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065041/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-10.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065041/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-10.jpg) | 43.54 KB |
author: regboro

comments.content: Designed by Slava Kirilenko, formerly free at Fontfabric under the name of [Archive](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065041/http:/fontfabric.com/archive-free-font) then turned into commercial release for Brownfox as [Institut](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065041/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/brownfox/institut)
